---

## How to fill up this form for effective communication

- **Task Outcome** has to be measurable either as a success-fail criterion or by a score. Qualitative approaches are not recommended. Possibly limit the number of item to one.
- **Dos and don'ts** is the list of actions strongly encouraged or notably discouraged.
- **Requried Resources** is the list of any form of available in-house assets including other employees to be mobilized to accomplish the above-mentioned **Task Outcome**. Keep the list as short as possible considering the time you need to complete this task.
- **References** include all the facts, data, and opinions you must know to explain this issue or task all by yourself in objective perspective. In doing so, you are required to enable yourself to complete the final documentation reporting the outcome of this task to any other member inside this organization if necessary.
- DO WRITE ALL ITEMS IN COMPLETE SENTENCES.
